title: 虚无世界3mod报错有大佬知道什么问题吗
author: Dou_Bi_
txt_content:
虚无世界3mod报错
[23:49:35] [Thread-84/INFO]: Exception encountered while running an AoALeaderboard task, skipping.
[23:49:35] [Thread-84/WARN]: java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException: Index: 1, Size: 1
[23:49:35] [Thread-84/WARN]:    at java.util.ArrayList.rangeCheck(Unknown Source)
[23:49:35] [Thread-84/WARN]:    at java.util.ArrayList.get(Unknown Source)
[23:49:35] [Thread-84/WARN]:    at net.tslat.aoa3.library.leaderboard.Leaderboard.addOrUpdatePlayer(Leaderboard.java:36)
[23:49:35] [Thread-84/WARN]:    at net.tslat.aoa3.library.leaderboard.AoALeaderboard$UpdatePlayerStat.run(AoALeaderboard.java:148)
[23:49:35] [Thread-84/WARN]:    at net.tslat.aoa3.library.leaderboard.AoALeaderboard.run(AoALeaderboard.java:43)

replies.author: cp666
replies.txt_content: 之前反馈过这个问题，作者说这对你的游戏没有影响，不管他

replies.author: Reon_Aqest
replies.txt_content: 这个报错并不影响什么,可以正常游戏,无视掉就好
